TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi beforefieldinit MethodBody extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供方法主體之中繼資料和 MSIL 的存取。

span.span: Provides access to the metadata and MSIL for the body of a method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會提供與存取權的本機變數和在方法主體中，例外狀況處理子句的相關資訊的 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) 的方法主體所組成。The class provides access to information about the local variables and exception-handling clauses in a method body, and to the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) that makes up the method body. 您可以使用語彙基元解析模組類別方法，例如， ，和，以解決在方法主體中的語彙基元物件物件，和提供的物件詳細的資訊類型、 方法和欄位在方法主體的 MSIL 所存取的詳細資訊。You can use the token-resolution methods of the module class, such as , , and , to resolve the tokens in the method body to objects, objects, and objects that provide detailed information about the types, methods, and fields accessed by the MSIL in the method body. > [!NOTE] > 剖析方法主體需要徹底了解的中繼資料和 MSIL 指令的格式。Parsing method bodies requires a thorough understanding of metadata and MSIL instruction formats. 資訊可在 Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) 文件中，特別是 「 第二部分：Metadata Definition and Semantics" 和 "Partition III:CIL Instruction Set"。Information can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics" and "Partition III: CIL Instruction Set". 您可以線上取得這份文件；請參閱 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和通用語言基礎結構標準](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)，以及 Ecma International 網站上的[標準 ECMA-335 - 通用語言基礎結構 (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site. 若要取得物件為指定的方法，請先取得物件的方法，然後呼叫物件的方法。To obtain a object for a given method, first obtain a object for the method, then call the object's method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會定義名為測試方法`MethodBodyExample`，並顯示其本機變數的資訊和例外狀況處理子句。The following code example defines a test method named `MethodBodyExample` and displays its local variable information and exception-handling clauses. 方法用來取得測試方法的物件。The method is used to obtain a object for the test method. 此範例會使用屬性，以取得一份物件，並接著會顯示其型別和索引順序。The example uses the property to obtain a list of objects and then displays their types and index order. 屬性用來取得例外狀況處理子句的清單。The property is used to obtain a list of exception-handling clauses. > [!NOTE] > 並非所有的電腦語言可以產生子句。Not all computer languages can generate clauses. Visual Basic 範例會顯示篩選子句中，使用 Visual Basic`When`運算式，會略過其他語言的範例。The Visual Basic example shows a filter clause, using a Visual Basic `When` expression, which is omitted from the examples for other languages. [!code-cpp[MethodBody#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會由衍生類別叫用的建構期間物件。This constructor is invoked by derived classes during the construction of objects.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property ExceptionHandlingClauses As IList(Of ExceptionHandlingClause)

summary.span: 取得包含在方法主體中之所有例外狀況處理子句的清單。

span.span: Gets a list that includes all the exception-handling clauses in the method body.

value.span: 的 物件，代表方法主體中的例外狀況處理子句。

span.span: An of objects representing the exception-handling clauses in the body of the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此清單會包括所有的 try 區塊中的所有子句在方法主體中。The list includes all clauses from all try blocks in the method body. 每個物件包含識別與相關聯的 try 區塊的資訊。Each object contains information that identifies the try block with which it is associated. > [!NOTE] > 使用例外狀況處理子句需要徹底了解的中繼資料和 MSIL 指令的格式。Working with exception-handling clauses requires a thorough understanding of metadata and MSIL instruction formats. 資訊可在 Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) 文件中，特別是 「 第二部分：Metadata Definition and Semantics" 和 "Partition III:CIL Instruction Set"。Information can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics" and "Partition III: CIL Instruction Set". 您可以線上取得這份文件；請參閱 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和通用語言基礎結構標準](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)，以及 Ecma International 網站上的[標準 ECMA-335 - 通用語言基礎結構 (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會定義名為測試方法`MethodBodyExample`並顯示其例外狀況處理子句的相關資訊。The following code example defines a test method named `MethodBodyExample` and displays information about its exception-handling clauses. 方法用來取得測試方法的物件。The method is used to obtain a object for the test method. 屬性用來取得一份物件。The property is used to obtain a list of objects. > [!NOTE] > 並非所有的電腦語言可以產生子句。Not all computer languages can generate clauses. Visual Basic 範例會顯示篩選子句中，使用 Visual Basic`When`運算式，會略過其他語言的範例。The Visual Basic example shows a filter clause, using a Visual Basic `When` expression, which is omitted from the examples for other languages. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#4)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#5)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance unsigned int8[] GetILAsByteArray() cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetILAsByteArray () As Byte()
abstract member GetILAsByteArray : unit -> byte[] override this.GetILAsByteArray : unit -> byte[]

summary.span: 傳回方法主體的 MSIL，當做位元組陣列。

span.span: Returns the MSIL for the method body, as an array of bytes.

returns.span: 型別 的陣列，包含方法主體的 MSIL。

span.span: An array of type that contains the MSIL for the method body.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用語彙基元解析模組類別方法，例如， ，和，以解決在方法主體中的語彙基元物件物件，和提供的物件詳細的資訊類型、 方法和欄位在方法主體的 MSIL 所存取的詳細資訊。You can use the token-resolution methods of the module class, such as , , and , to resolve the tokens in the method body to objects, objects, and objects that provide detailed information about the types, methods, and fields accessed by the MSIL in the method body. > [!NOTE] > 剖析方法主體需要徹底了解的中繼資料和 MSIL 指令的格式。Parsing method bodies requires a thorough understanding of metadata and MSIL instruction formats. 資訊可在 Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) 文件中，特別是 「 第二部分：Metadata Definition and Semantics" 和 "Partition III:CIL Instruction Set"。Information can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics" and "Partition III: CIL Instruction Set". 您可以線上取得這份文件；請參閱 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和通用語言基礎結構標準](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)，以及 Ecma International 網站上的[標準 ECMA-335 - 通用語言基礎結構 (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property InitLocals As Boolean
public: virtual property bool InitLocals { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出方法主體中的區域變數是否初始化為其型別的預設值。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether local variables in the method body are initialized to the default values for their types.

value.span: 如果方法主體含有程式碼，而此程式碼會將參考型別的區域變數初始化為 ，或將實值型別 (Value Type) 的區域變數初始化為以零初始化的值，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the method body contains code to initialize local variables to for reference types, or to the zero-initialized value for value types; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會參考的變數，未明確初始化，也就是，這類宣告語法的變數`int x;`在 C# 或`Dim x As Integer`Visual Basic 中。The property refers to variables that are not explicitly initialized; that is, variables that are declared with syntax such as `int x;` in C# or `Dim x As Integer` in Visual Basic. 參考變數會初始化為`null`預設。Reference variables are initialized to `null` by default. 數值變數都會初始化為零。Numeric variables are initialized to zero. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會定義名為測試方法`MethodBodyExample`，並顯示其本機變數的資訊和例外狀況處理子句。The following code example defines a test method named `MethodBodyExample` and displays its local variable information and exception-handling clauses. 方法用來取得測試方法的物件。The method is used to obtain a object for the test method. 和屬性會顯示。The and properties are displayed. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property LocalSignatureMetadataToken As Integer
public: virtual property int LocalSignatureMetadataToken { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得簽章的中繼資料語彙基元，其描述中繼資料中的方法區域變數。

span.span: Gets a metadata token for the signature that describes the local variables for the method in metadata.

value.span: 表示中繼資料語彙基元的整數。

span.span: An integer that represents the metadata token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以取得方法之區域變數的相關資訊。Use the property to obtain information about the method's local variables. > [!NOTE] > 本機變數的簽章的相關資訊可在 Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) 文件中，特別是 「 第二部分：中繼資料定義和語意 」。Information about local variable signatures can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics". 您可以線上取得這份文件；請參閱 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和通用語言基礎結構標準](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)，以及 Ecma International 網站上的[標準 ECMA-335 - 通用語言基礎結構 (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property LocalVariables As IList(Of LocalVariableInfo)

summary.span: 取得方法主體中所宣告之區域變數的清單。

span.span: Gets the list of local variables declared in the method body.

value.span: 物件的 ，其描述方法主體中所宣告的區域變數。

span.span: An of objects that describe the local variables declared in the method body.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您不需要中繼資料語彙基元所提供的本機變數簽章屬性。You do not need the metadata token for the local variable signature provided by the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會定義名為測試方法`MethodBodyExample`並顯示其本機變數資訊。The following code example defines a test method named `MethodBodyExample` and displays its local variable information. 方法用來取得測試方法的物件。The method is used to obtain a object for the test method. 屬性用來取得一份物件。The property is used to obtain a list of objects. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#3)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#5)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#6)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property MaxStackSize As Integer
public: virtual property int MaxStackSize { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得執行此方法時，運算元堆疊上的最大項目數。

span.span: Gets the maximum number of items on the operand stack when the method is executing.

value.span: 執行此方法時，運算元堆疊上的最大項目數。

span.span: The maximum number of items on the operand stack when the method is executing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) 文件，特別是 「 第二部分：Metadata Definition and Semantics" 和 "Partition III:CIL Instruction Set"。For more information, see the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics" and "Partition III: CIL Instruction Set". 您可以線上取得這份文件；請參閱 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和通用語言基礎結構標準](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)，以及 Ecma International 網站上的[標準 ECMA-335 - 通用語言基礎結構 (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會定義名為測試方法`MethodBodyExample`，並顯示其本機變數的資訊和例外狀況處理子句。The following code example defines a test method named `MethodBodyExample` and displays its local variable information and exception-handling clauses. 方法用來取得測試方法的物件。The method is used to obtain a object for the test method. 和屬性會顯示。The and properties are displayed. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
